sections.heading: Creation of New Michigan Commission on Law Enforcement Standards Within Department of State Police as Type I Agency; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Justice Training Commission, Michigan Justice Training Fund, and Commission on Law Enforcement Standards and Law Enforcement Officers Trainin
sections.text: Creation of New Michigan Commission on Law Enforcement Standards Within Department of State Police as Type I Agency; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Justice Training Commission, Michigan Justice Training Fund, and Commission on Law Enforcement Standards and Law Enforcement Officers Training Fund to the New Michigan Commission on Law Enforcement Standards by Type III Transfer.
